content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"   xmlns:documentcontainer="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/documentContainer#"   xmlns:file="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/File#"   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" >   <documentcontainer:documentContainer rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082">     <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">This dataset consists of a range of ecological measurements collected from a set of arable fields, each sown with a combination of genetically modified and conventional maize crops. Measurements include species counts in the following areas: weed seedbank, vegetation in the crop, field edge vegetation, invertebrates. The data were collected as part of the Farm Scale Evaluations (FSEs), a four-year programme of research by independent researchers aimed at studying the effect that the management practices associated with Genetically Modified Herbicide Tolerant (GMHT) crops might have on farmland wildlife, when compared with weed control used with non-GM crops. Data were collected by a consortium of: the Institute of Terrestrial Ecology, ITE (now the Centre for Ecology and Hydrology, CEH), the Institute of Arable Crop Research (now Rothamstead Research, IACR) and the Scottish Crop Research Institute, SCRI (now the James Hutton Institute, JHI). Data were collected for four crops overall (Beet, Maize, Spring-sown Oilseed Rape and Winter-sown oilseed Rape).</dcterms:description>     <documentcontainer:id xml:lang="en">ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082</documentcontainer:id>     <dcterms:subject>arable</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>crops</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>biodiversity</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>Species distribution</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>seedbank</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>weeds</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>arable farming</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>NERC_DDC</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>invertebrates</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>soil</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>Britain</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>genetically modified herbicide-tolerant crops</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>sugar beet</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>CEH Biodiversity Programme</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>CEH Project C01732</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>oilseed rape</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>vegetation</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>functional groups</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>environmental impact</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>maize</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>agro-ecology</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:subject>trophic interactions</dcterms:subject>     <dcterms:creator>clamw</dcterms:creator>     <documentcontainer:catalogLink>http://data.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082</documentcontainer:catalogLink>     <dcterms:issued rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-27T10:10:00Z</dcterms:issued>     <dcterms:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2013-06-03T08:51:50Z</dcterms:modified>     <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Farm scale evaluations of herbicide tolerant genetically modified crops - maize</dcterms:title>     <dcterms:created rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T14:21:59Z</dcterms:created>     <dcterms:isPartOf rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata"/>     <dcterms:hasPart>       <file:File rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082/gm-farm-scale-trials-documentation">         <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">Supporting documents for GM Farm Scale data</dcterms:description>         <dcterms:creator>clamw</dcterms:creator>         <file:id xml:lang="en">gm-farm-scale-trials-documentation</file:id>         <dcterms:modified rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T15:36:22Z</dcterms:modified>         <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">GM Farm Scale Trials Documentation</dcterms:title>         <dcterms:created rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime">2012-02-23T15:36:22Z</dcterms:created>         <dcterms:isPartOf rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082"/>       </file:File>     </dcterms:hasPart>     <documentcontainer:fileIdentifier xml:lang="en">ca6752ed-3a22-4790-a86d-afadaedda082</documentcontainer:fileIdentifier>   </documentcontainer:documentContainer> </rdf:RDF>
